keyword: how many calories in a bagel and cream cheese
title: How Many Calories in a Bagel and Cream Cheese?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a bagel and cream cheese, including full nutrition breakdown, macros, and easy tweaks for your serving.
h1: How Many Calories in a Bagel and Cream Cheese?
assumptions: Plain medium bagel (~105g), topped with 1 oz (2 tbsp) full-fat cream cheese; no additional toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by bagel size, brand, cream cheese type, and preparation; check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A medium bagel with 1 oz cream cheese provides ~388 kcal, with high carbs from the bagel and fat from the cheese.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use low-fat cream cheese (1 oz instead of full-fat)
Add 1 oz smoked salmon on top

faqs.q: How many calories in a bagel alone?
faqs.a: A plain medium bagel has about 289 kcal, without cream cheese.

faqs.q: What if I use less cream cheese?
faqs.a: 1 tbsp (0.5 oz) cream cheese reduces total to ~339 kcal.

faqs.q: Are bagels high in sodium with cream cheese?
faqs.a: Yes, ~556 mg total, mostly from the bagel; opt for low-sodium versions.

faqs.q: How much protein in a bagel and cream cheese?
faqs.a: About 11.7 g per serving, mainly from the bagel.

faqs.q: Does toasting the bagel change calories?
faqs.a: No significant change; toasting doesn't add calories but may alter texture.
